title: Mystic Robe
summaries: The Mystic Robe (Gypsy Robe on [img:Old-gen console version] Old-gen console) is an armor item that can be worn in the shirt slot. It provides minimal defense (2) but a 6% damage and critical strike boost to magic weapons, along with a 10% reduction in mana use. It is purchased from the Traveling Merchant for 3 GC50 SC (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) / 2 GC (Old-gen console version).

Wearing the <linked>Wizard Hat</linked> alongside the robe provides a set bonus of +10% magic critical strike chance, while wearing a <linked>Magic Hat</linked> alongside it provides a set bonus of +60 <linked>Mana</linked>. Any leg-slot equipment can be worn with these set bonuses intact.
